ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Interesting idea, brother Manjushri.   To advance to the highest levels of accomplishment, without taking the life of a human or demihuman (elf, dwarf,
ygData.messageBody:
>
>From: "John N. Mosqueda" <mosquito@...>
>
>It would be my hope that no monk
>among us would go so far as to take the life of a fellow human in >order to
>gain
>some modicum of advancement. >In Quellious' name,
>
>Manjushri
>Bearer of the yellow sash of the Ashen Order
>

Interesting idea, brother Manjushri. To advance to the highest levels of
accomplishment, without taking the life of a human or demihuman (elf, dwarf,
halfling, gnome). Alas, I've already slain a fair number of pirates and
bandits, but I wonder if I can abstain from doing so for the remainder of my
days? Truly a test worthy of a monk.

Dornn, Level 17 Monk (Feign Death! Yeah, baby!), Brell Serilis, currently
hunting Gargoyles in the Ocean of Tears.
